transcript:
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Haanji, Shri Adarsh is film mein baat ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART trade head office se baat kar raha hun. Main Adarsh Chaudhari sir se bhi baat kar raha hun?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Sir actually aap se hamara discussion hua tha kuch din pehle jisme ek feedback sir aapne dala tha iske andar jisme aap chah rahe the aapko ek field support ya field person assign kiya jaye right isme?
Customer: Haanji, haanji.
Executive: Ispe sir aapne bataya tha ki aapki ek aur company hai IndiaMART se jo abhi Shri Raj films ke regarding run kar rahi hai right sir isme?
Customer: Haanji, haanji.
Executive: Thoda sa time isliye lag gaya sir main aapko update dena chahunga jo current ka update hai. Actually sir humne team jo hamari local ki team hai Maharashtra ki IndiaMART ki isse humne confirm kiya sir ye jo location hai na sir aapka Shri Raj film ka ye Thane ka hai sir aapka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Correct bola?
Customer: Matlab hamari jo branch hai sir, hamari jo branch hai Thane ki hai sir aur Bhiwandi ke andar sir hame kya karna padta hai process pehle aapko bata deta hun jo bhi local hamare managers hain in exception basis jaise aapne request dali to hame check karna padta hai us location pe hamara field allowed hai ya nahi hai pin code ke according allowed hai ya nahi hai. So ispe sir humne aapke jo ZMs hai sir unse check bhi karaya hai BM ke andar to jo Bhiwandi location hai sir ye aapki different location aa rahi hai aur is location pe hamari jo services hai field support services wo nahi available sir isme. Isliye sir aath din ka time bhi lag gaya sir mera mail sheet bhi yahan par run kara tha internally unke sath mein aur the call bhi discuss kiya humne local person jo aapke yahan par the Thane ke.
Customer: Ye mere ko, ye mere ko aap same cheez mail pe likh ke de dijiye phir main.
Executive: Bilkul sir main aapko mail ji ji ji. Aapko koi dikkat nahi sir main mail pe bhi aapko drop kara deta hun. Isliye maine saat din ka pura time liya sir maine saat din tak call nahi kara aapko. Hamare internal mail chal raha tha jiske andar ye confirmation wahan ke BM ki taraf se hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye location agar aapki Thane mein hoti sir jahan aapka location hai wahan par to main kara deta usko.
Customer: Nahi nahi ye cheez to aap log package lene ke pehle nahi karte hai na disclose aap pehle se yehi kehte hai pan India mil jayega kahin bhi. Fir uske baad ye nayi cheez nayi cheez aap phir abhi nikalte hai to is tarah se to work nahi hota na business.
Executive: But sir ek cheez main matlab aap mere client hai sir main us term pe nahi puchne ja raha hun as an exception basis like sir koi bhi team jaise hoti bhi hai jaise suppose karo koi aapko agar koi commit bhi karta hai to kisi ne matlab koi return pe diya hai just asking like kuch confirmation diya hai to at least hum ye to check kara paye confirmation aapko ke andar on what basis is giving. Kyunki maine to pura sir find out karaya wahan ke jo ZM hai main aapko naam bhi bata deta hun Abhishek Gupta hai sir wahan par aapke Thane ke bhi Abhishek Gupta hai aur Bhiwandi wahan ki side pe bhi jo baki location Abhishek Gupta hai aur unke under mein do bande kam karte hai ek Rajan Gupta hai aapke aur ek Satyajit Desai hai. To Thane mein aapki branch hai na wahan par Satyajit Desai hai sir pura communication call pe hua hai hamare sath mein to Thane ke andar hota to main kara deta ab yahan par jaake jo distance aa rahi hai na inko pin code ke according avail karate hain services to Bhiwandi jo location aa rahi hai wo pin code ke andar nahi aa rahi sir isme.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Fir bhi main run kar raha tha ki at least mujhe approval mil jaye but finally sir wahan ke Rajan Gupta jo BM the aaj dobara confirmation aaya that ye jo location hai Bhiwandi hamare pin code mein nahi aa rahi hai aur yahan par hamare koi services nahi hai isiliye phir finally maine pura seven days ka time leke aaj main aapko under point information de raha hun sir isme.
Customer: Theek hai aap mere ko mail bhej dijiye phir.
Executive: Baki ek cheez sir meri surety rahegi aapko taki maine starting mein bhi kaha tha but you are advent for the physical support only tabhi maine uske liye pehle try kara. Adarsh ji dekhiye profile meri team ke paas mein hai ye meri surety hai sir jo bhi discussion jo bhi queries aapki face to face jo aap keh rahe the sir ho sakti hai main aapko 100% surety dunga sir wo jitna bhi aapke doubts queries resolve out the process we are from the promotion department first of all. Hmm. To aapko servicing mein koi dikkat nahi aayegi this is my surety. Aap chahe agar is tarike ki hai I will drop your mail as well for the video meeting concern ki agar kabhi koi dikkat aati hai my team be available aur further aap connect directly sir agar aap chahe agar aapki koi team bhi hai to hum ek whatsapp pe group bhi create kar lete hai sir agar aap permanent ho to hum kabhi bhi aapko team ko lage ki sir abhi ye dikkat aa rahi hai aap connect kariye to at least I should have knowledge ki sir ha dikkat aa rahi hai to hame connect karna chahiye longest my team jaisa aapko support chahiye sir hamari taraf se at a backend sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aap comfortable hai sir group ke regarding if you want. Whatsapp if I am talking about.
Customer: Haan ji yahan par aap apni team ko include kar sakte hai sir.
Executive: Aap kin kin ko include karenge group mein? Dekhiye main to rahunga sir main yahan par branch hun meri team ke andar Altamas hai inke under mein kam manager Shruti theek hai to main dono ko include karunga aapko include kar lunga sir agar aapke koi team member hai sir I will make you an admin aap team ko add karaiye taki kabhi koi dikkat aaye at least we har ki should know ki aapko dikkat aa rahi hai we should have to approach to connect mera personally karega aapko in case agar nahi karta to.
Customer: Theek hai. Main group create kar leta hun Adarsh ji baki servicing mein koi dikkat nahi aayegi phir main repeat kar raha hun jab aapko meeting chahiye sir 9 to 6 Monday to Friday we are available you can connect with us.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir baki aur koi feedback I see feedback main aap se proceed kar raha hun for the close any other feedback as of now?
Customer: Nahi aap mere ko bas mail drop kar dijiye phir aage.
Executive: Theek hai aur sir ek chhoti si aur request hai sir do minute group pe bhi dal dunga aapki na yahan par I am leader ki services run kar rahi hai IndiaMART pe theek hai ek I am leader hai ek I am star ke andar ispe aapne ek category leke rakhi sir mild steel tee karke category hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Correct hai ek elbow hai mild steel elbow ek mild steel tee karke category hai ye jo mild steel tee category hai sir is category pe na sir thode se aap kam active dikh rahe ho is category ko hame active banana hai aapko aur active banane ke liye kuch activity hame karani padegi sir to iske liye kaise hum support kar payenge aapko over the call video meeting sir ya aapki koi team hai sir to agar aap abhi available ho to aap bata sakte ho nahi to agar aap kal ka time dete ho jab bhi bhi time dete ho sir.
Customer: Theek hai aapko baad mein aapko main contact kar lunga ye cheez ke liye abhi aapko ye cheez se aage badhiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants field support for Shri Raj films.

- Customer complains about service availability disclosure.

- Customer needs the same information on mail.



Resolution:

- Executive explained field support not available in Bhiwandi.

- Executive assured profile management by their team.

- Executive offered video meetings and WhatsApp group support.

- Executive requested focus on 'Mild Steel Tee' category.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the details on mail.

- Customer will contact later regarding 'Mild Steel Tee'.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- field support, location, pin code, whatsapp group, category
